relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, no murmurs, rubs, or gallops
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, non-tender to palpation, active bowel sounds, right-sided drain in place, small amount of ecchymosis around drain, bile draining freely (intermittently blood-tinged); purulent drainage subsided
relevant_findings.neurological: Alert and oriented x 3, ambulatory without assistance
